example.text: We should be so lucky to have them return to service after the way their government has treated them. Frighteningly, every branch of our military missed their 2022 recruitment goals by thousands of service members due to the mandate.

At a House Natural Resources Committee hearing this week, I discussed unleashing America's mineral potential and the dangers of our dependence on Communist China for our mineral needs. We can have both reasonable timeframes for reviews AND environmental safeguards.

Military Vaccine Mandate No More Catch up on the latest news from Minnesota's 8th Congressional District ? A Week in the Great Eight Military Vaccine Mandate No More Dear friend, I am happy to see that in this year's National Defense Authorization Act the COVID-19 vaccine mandate for our service men and women is finally ending.

These costs are hurting American families and are not a cause for celebration. Biden's far-left agenda has led to inflation that's crushing American families, a wide-open southern border and a crime crisis debilitating our cities.

I enjoyed my conversation with ABTC's team where we discussed the need for permitting reform and importance of increasing our domestic production of critical minerals. Minnesota miners stand ready and able so we can reclaim America's mineral supply chains!

This self-inflicted threat to our national security couldn't come at a worse time as Communist China is increasingly emboldened, and the globe is more volatile than it has been in decades. At a time when the world needs America's leadership and strength, we need to build our readiness on all fronts, not deter our best and brightest from volunteering to serve our nation.
